reviewText: Too much talking...not enough variety.  Not what I was expecting.  Would be much better without all the group talking in between each demonstration.

If you're open to new things and like to explore, this is a very informative and arousing program.  There is lots of great information in this program about what's new in the sex toy world, presented by knowledgeable sex experts. Then real couples demonstrate using everything from dildos to vibrators to anal toys and lubes.  Not only instructional but a real turn-on for us. If you are looking to improve your love life and your partner's, this DVD is definitely a good purchase.
